summary: Botasky and Packy are private contractors, working in the Middle East, with support from a distant helicopter-mobile base. Their jobs are as "sniper" and "spotter", the spotter is the team ... See full summary »
cast: Sawaki Akimoto|Mandy Flynn|Tom Flynn|Satoshi Hino|Yûki Hirako|Will Prescott|Kenta Sakai|Hiroshi Tsuchida|Matthew Watkins
title: Cat Shit One
